message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare and exclusive item that will greatly exceed your expectations. I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not going to fall for the sales pitch. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're skeptical, but I assure you this is a genuine high-quality product. I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount to sweeten the deal. You can have it for $90. It's still a great value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm not convinced. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're still hesitant, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, so you can try it out and return it if you're not completely satisfied. You can have it for $100, and if you're not blown away, you can return it for a full refund.
Okay, I'll take the risk. I'll buy the product.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! Since you've already had a positive experience, I'm willing to offer you a special 'loyalty discount' for this next product. I'll give you an exclusive deal: if you buy this high-quality product, I'll throw in a free accessory worth $20. That brings the price down to $80. It's a great value, and I think you'll love the product even more with the added bonus.
I appreciate the loyalty discount, but I'm not going to get caught up in the extras. I'll pass on this one.

Let me be transparent with you: I've had a few customers who have purchased this exact product and have been extremely satisfied with its performance. It's a game-changer for anyone who uses it. It's the same great product, but I'm willing to give you a discount because I need to clear out my inventory. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
Alright, I'll take a chance. I'll buy the product for $90.

You can have this one for $100, and I'll give you another one of equal or greater value absolutely free. You can choose from a selection of our top products, and I'm confident you'll love both of them.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying two products at once. I'll pass on this one.
